Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Researcher in the GEMINA project, funded by the Italian Ministry of Education, University and Research and the Italian Ministry of Environment, Land and Sea

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Project Coordinator of the Horizon 2020 project: Psychological, social and financial barriers to ENergy efficiency (PENNY), 2016-2019 (€1.5M)

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Teaching Assistant in Econometrics at the Graduate School in Public Economics- DEFAP

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Tutor in Statistics for Economists, University of Sussex, UK
External Research Fellow, Centre for Research and Analysis of Migration (CReAm), London, UK
Researcher at Centro EuroMediterraneo sui Cambiamenti Climatici

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Senior Researcher in the 6th Framework Programme project: Sustainable Development in a Diverse World (SUS.DIV)
Senior Researcher in the 7th Framework Programme ERC project: Innovation for Climate chAnge mitigation: a study of energy R&d, its Uncertain effectiveness and Spillovers (ICARUS)
Senior Researcher in the 7th Framework Programme project: Public health impacts in URban environments of Greenhouse gas Emissions reduction strategies (PURGE)
Senior Researcher in the 7th Framework Programme project: Impacts Quantification of global changes (Global-IQ)

Senior Researcher in the 7th Framework Programme project: POst-CArbon CIties of Tomorrow: foresight for sustainable pathways towards liveable, affordable and prospering cities in a world context (POCACITO)
Project Coordinator and Work-package Leader of the Horizon 2020 project: Psychological, social and financial barriers to ENergy efficiency (PENNY)
